|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = MMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;S10004; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial(SPI) |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U3235F; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = Yes |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2021 |fccapprovdate = 09/14/2016 |estreldate = 06/28/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833181545R |asin = B01I4223HS |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|ZyXEL NBG6816 (Armor Z1)}}
===Specifications=== *Powerful 1.7GHz dual-core processor boosts performance *Memory: 4GB eMMC flash and 512MB DDR3 RAM *2nd Generation AC2600 Chipset for 2600Mbps speed 802.11ac *Get ultimate Wi-Fi speeds-up to 2.53Gbps (800+1733 Mbps) *Quad-Stream technology delivers Wi-Fi to multiple devices simultaneously *Streamboost optimization to deliver the gaming and streaming experience *Next generation Wave2 Wi-Fi - 160MHz, MU-MIMO, Quad-stream *4x4 MU-MIMO technology that enables accelerated transmission :to wireless devices for even faster Wi-Fi speeds *Four high-performance external antennas deliver maximum range *Beamforming antennas for enhanced wireless coverage and stability *Twin USB ports offer high-speed, USB storage-ready access *Dynamic QoS prioritizes network traffic by application and device *Easy setup wtih eaZy 123 and user freindly usage monitoring
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nbg6817 ''ZyXEL NBG6817'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6817 HW Data])
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/zyxel-armor-z2-ac2600-mu-mimo-dual-band-gigabit-router.33345/ ''ZyXEL Armor Z2'' on '''SNB''' forums] :*It will offer up to 2600Mbps of combined wireless speeds with ::the [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 1.7GHz dual-core processor at its’ heart :*It comes with 512MB of RAM, and 4GB eMMC Flash Storage for router ::applications such as the included Qualcomm Streamboost technology :*Four fine-tuned dual-band external antennas offering 500m2 coverage :*802.11ac Wave2 MU-MIMO and support for 160MHz channel bandwidth :*MyZyXEL Cloud with 2 USB ports (1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0): CrystalDiskMark ::testing showed read speeds reached 94Mb/s and write speeds of 50Mb/s :*ZyXEL’s eaZy123 setup, ZyXEL One Connect App support, and ZyXEL Photo *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60385:1756#1756 ''ZyXEL Armor Z2'' on '''iXBT''' forums] :[http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z2.shtml?t=p '''Armor Z2'''] ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router'' :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz dual core :*Memory: 512MB RAM and 4GB eMMC flash :*Wireless Standard: ::802.11b/g/n (2.4GHz), 802.11a/n/ac (5GHz) :*Wireless Speed: Transmit/Receive ::800Mbps for 2.4GHz ::1733Mbps for 5GHz :*Antenna: 4x dual-band high performance :*USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6817 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nbg6817 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 17.01.5 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = tftp server ip 192.168.1.99/24, rename image to 'ras.bin', hold WPS key while powering up }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[ZyXEL NBG6816]] (''Armor Z1'') - AC2350 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router {{•}} [http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z1.shtml?t=p PPage]
